title: A Time for caring (TEFC)
brief_description: Sexual abuse often starts between the ages of 5 and 10 and may continue into the teenage years. This program stresses that teachers and classified staff at schools should be aware of what to look for and what to do in cases of suspected sexual abuse. Narrated by Sandra Baker.
